channel.title: Open graph on Minimo
channel.description: Recent content in Open graph on Minimo

item.title: Open Graph Support
item.description: Minimo has built-in support for Open Graph tags. The extra configuration options used by Open Graph tags are noted below. You can set Facebook’s App ID and Admins tags by the following config options: [params.opengraph] [params.opengraph.facebook] admins = "" appid = "" admins field accepts a single Facebook Profile ID number. appid field accepts a single Facebook Application ID number. You can also add you Facebook Page’s ID with the following config option:
